name: The atack of the spoky bread guy
name_original: The atack of the spoky bread guy
description:
IN the game You play as the Sandwitch Maker Man And haave to make A Sandwitch but a n angry Bread man is chasing ou!!!1 and you have to make the snadwitch without getting deathed!

This game was made for the low quality game jam, what did you expect?
